questions.question: Confirm the equipment with below provided image.
upload the image of the equipment, contact the technical team for recorrections and scan the bar cod again
confirm is there any physical damage of the equipment.
prepare the Damage / Incident and Missing Report.
connect the equipment to the mains and confirm whether the equipment is getting ON.
check and confirm whether the wall outlet is provided with AC voltage of 230.

videos.src: assets/videos/ECG Vesta 301i/VIDEO FOR CHECKING WALL OULET VOLTAGE.mp4
videos.videoName: VIDEO FOR CHECKING WALL OULET VOLTAGE

questions.question: shift the equipment to another place where AC voltage of 230 is provided
check the power cord adaptor and confirm whether the voltage is available.
replace the power cord adaptor with a new one
check the continuity of fuse and confirm whether the fuse is defective
replace the fuses with a new one
open the equipment as shown in the video, repair or replace the control board accordingly

videos.videoName: Video for replacing the control board

questions.question: Check and confirm is there any muscle interference in the ECG.
cross check the cables and confirm whether the cables are defective.
replace the cables with a new one
check the cable pin connector for any damage / breakage of pins.
replace the cable pin connector with a new one
check and confirm whether the battery voltage is low.

videos.src: assets/videos/ECG Vesta 301i/VIDEO REQUIRED FOR CHECKING THE BATTERY VOLTAGE.mp4
videos.videoName: VIDEO REQUIRED FOR CHECKING THE BATTERY VOLTAGE

questions.question: replace the battery with a new one
check and confirm whether there is a proper grounding at the socket.
shift the equipment to another where proper grounding is available.
check and confirm whether there is any loose connection or breakage of cable from battery to control board
reseat / replace the cable accordingly
repair / replace the control board accordingly

videos.videoName: Video for replacing the control board

questions.question: check and confirm whether there is a straight in the ECG print.
cross check the cables and confirm whether the cables are defective.
, replace the cables with a new one
check the cable pin connector for any damage or breakage of pins.
replace the cable pin connector with a new one
repair / replace the ECG module accordingly
check and confirm whether the paper is rolling during ECG is taken.
check and confirm whether the paper roll is placed properly.
place the paper roll properly
open the equipment as shown in the video, check and confirm whether there is any dust or any obstructions in the gears.
clean the gears carefully
check for any breakage or damage of gears.
replace the printer drive with a new one
motor is defective, so replace the printer drive with a new one
check and confirm whether there is partial print or dull ECG print.
open the equipment as shown in the video, clean the thermal head with a soft cloth and confirm whether the problem still persist.
replace the thermal head with a new one
check and confirm whether there is no print out during the ECG is taken.
check whether the paper is placed properly.
place the paper roll properly
check for any loose connection or breakage of cable from printer to control board.
reseat or replace the cable accordingly
replace or repair the control board accordingly

videos.videoName: Video for replacing the control board

questions.question: If the problem is not yet solved, contact the technical team for any other assistance through video call
Thanks
